position: Product Manager • Ex-Creditail • Ex-Ola Electric • IIT KGP

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Zero-to-one journey building a payments and credit product for small-medium businesses. Moved business and product metrics. Launched and driving the products across mobile, web, and WhatsApp-based platforms.
experience.description_html: Zero-to-one journey building a payments and credit product for small-medium businesses. Moved business and product metrics. Launched and driving the products across mobile, web, and WhatsApp-based platforms. <!---->

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: Understanding user sentiments, and suggesting changes for improved user experience of the Sequoia-backed startup.• Established and scaled up NPS collection by 20% MoM; led to 3 key process changes to solve major user detraction issues.• Co-led a team of 8 to run user research on 2000+ users; presented insights to business vertical, leading to 5% increase in NPS.• Conceptualized lead categorization witnessing 70% adoption rate, enabling counselors to prioritize and serve users efficiently.• Piloted an experiment, getting 50% utilization rate, to add slot-booking feature in web app with current 14% D7 retention.
experience.description_html: Understanding user sentiments, and suggesting changes for improved user experience of the Sequoia-backed startup.• Established and scaled up NPS collection by 20% MoM; led to 3 key process changes to solve major user detraction issues.• Co-led a team of 8 to run user research on 2000+ users; presented insights to business vertical, leading to 5% increase in NPS.• Conceptualized lead categorization witnessing 70% adoption rate, enabling counselors to prioritize and serve users efficiently.• Piloted an experiment, getting 50% utilization rate, to add slot-booking feature in web app with current 14% D7 retention.

experience.title: Operations Intern
experience.description: Expanding business of the fast-paced, pre-seed stage startup providing end-to-end kitchen aide with 2500+ cook partners.• Onboarded 600+ cook partners by strategizing & launching a referral program and 2 competitions in the budget of INR 20K.• Established area-wise networks for customer leads by expanding target area by 50%; led to a 20% increase in customer pool.• Ideated and organized 3 events to engage 300+ cook partners; implemented attendance tracking system to enhance service.
experience.description_html: Expanding business of the fast-paced, pre-seed stage startup providing end-to-end kitchen aide with 2500+ cook partners.• Onboarded 600+ cook partners by strategizing & launching a referral program and 2 competitions in the budget of INR 20K.• Established area-wise networks for customer leads by expanding target area by 50%; led to a 20% increase in customer pool.• Ideated and organized 3 events to engage 300+ cook partners; implemented attendance tracking system to enhance service. <!---->

Delivered Statement of Purpose, broadcast live with 6K+ views, defended 3 proposals for 13k member electorate. • Case Study: Qualified among top 200 Int’l teams (1300 regd.) in Solvay Business Game 2021, Europe’s biggest… Show more

projects: [{"title":"Masters Dissertation","start_date":"Aug 2021","end_date":"Apr 2022","description":"Applying machine learning algorithms to predict aerosol optical depth (AOD) used for estimating visibility in a region.• Extracted 20-year meteorological data of 9 parameters, pre-processed by removing outliers using Z Score and normalization.• Performed exploratory analysis by plotting correlation matrix, selecting relevant features for better AOD prediction accuracy.• Employed Random Forest, SVM and ANN algorithm and performed hyperparameter tuning; selected model based on RMSE."},{"title":"Pro bono service in rural areas of Jaswantgarh, Rajasthan during COVID-19 (Self-Project)","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Aug 2020","description":"Explored and learned about some primary on-ground challenges, took initiatives to solve them and serve the community.• Initiated 50+ households' survey; ideated action points with Surajmal Taparia Trust to help the 40% poverty-stricken families.• Raised donations of INR 10L to build houses for 7 needy families; initiated construction activities with the shoestring budget.• Educated and assisted 30 families on rainwater harvesting, helping cope up with the irregular supply of 65 LPCD tap water."},{"title":"Optimising Biogas Plant (Prof B Bhattacharya)","start_date":"Oct 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"• Conceptualized & Proposed a plan for construction of biogas plant which can replace LPG cylinders saving Rs.11,164/day.• Ascertained a conversion of 1250 kg of food wastages generated from 22 halls of residence into 345 kg of biogas.• Stipulated all the potential hazards due to the lack of proper earthing & maintenance of the plant for its safe execution inside the campus."},{"title":"Spot Speedy Study (Prof Sudeshna Mitra)","start_date":"Oct 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"• Collected and analysed the speed data of more than 100 vehicles of different categories at a given location for different time periods.• Interpreted 85th percentile, Mean, Variance & standard deviation of speed & suggested improvement of roads considering safety."}]
